blog.name: fat-amiee
blog.title: Fat Amiee Loves You
blog.description: Tumblr is my friend but also not my friend.

tags: that clip would be the end of me
summary: Epiphany
title: Epiphany
body:
Remember when Niils told David he wants the audience to be able to see Eliott and Lucas, kiss, hug, fuck, etc etc. 

Now we’ve got Maxence and Axel telling us David wanted more tongue and intensity. 

Anyone thinking what I’m thinking?  

QUASI ANGRY FUCK REUNION where they release all the pent up frustration, anger, sadness they’ve been feeling.

Lawd grant me strength. I won’t survive this.

reblog.comment:
Remember when Niils told David he wants the audience to be able to see Eliott and Lucas, kiss, hug, fuck, etc etc. 

Now we’ve got Maxence and Axel telling us David wanted more tongue and intensity. 

Anyone thinking what I’m thinking?  

QUASI ANGRY FUCK REUNION where they release all the pent up frustration, anger, sadness they’ve been feeling.

Lawd grant me strength. I won’t survive this.

trail.content_raw:
Remember when Niils told David he wants the audience to be able to see Eliott and Lucas, kiss, hug, fuck, etc etc. 

Now we’ve got Maxence and Axel telling us David wanted more tongue and intensity. 

Anyone thinking what I’m thinking?  

QUASI ANGRY FUCK REUNION where they release all the pent up frustration, anger, sadness they’ve been feeling.

Lawd grant me strength. I won’t survive this.
trail.content:
Remember when Niils told David he wants the audience to be able to see Eliott and Lucas, kiss, hug, fuck, etc etc. 

Now we’ve got Maxence and Axel telling us David wanted more tongue and intensity. 

Anyone thinking what I’m thinking?  

QUASI ANGRY FUCK REUNION where they release all the pent up frustration, anger, sadness they’ve been feeling.

Lawd grant me strength. I won’t survive this.

blog.name: noahcoma
blog.title: Sing my name, pretend it's a song

summary: Hello~  I love watching your reaction videos thank you so much for uploading them!! I saw you answering that ask about a...
question: Hello~  I love watching your reaction videos thank you so much for uploading them!! I saw you answering that ask about a Filipino Skam and it got me wondering... Do you think it has anything to do with how much the kdrama industry is taking over the Philippines right now? I’m not from there but that’s what I’ve been hearing...  I thought I should ask a native person’s opinion.  Much love! 💗
answer:
anon, i unfortunately don’t have a short answer to this so bear with me as i gEt in2 iT right now. real quick: these are all empirical and anecdotal. i’m not going into studies and articles, everything is purely my opinion :)

*cracks knuckles*

kdrama: yes. i think this media epidemic of easily digested love stories, told in the same three acts, is now part and parcel of what is considered beloved by the public – or as many would note: “pang masa”

even before the widespread of kdramas – which, i also enjoy, don’t get me wrong – teleseryes were (and still are) very much a thing. the plot twists of sara actually being cousins with mara who is the mother of clara and mortal enemy of tita cha, who has been cheating with the plumber is as complicated as they’re willing to go. and while this is unappealing to me (and perhaps some of you) that is not the case with the masses. they gobble that shit up like it’s the last drop of water in the sahara, my dude.

i don’t necessarily think it’s problematic so much as it is B O R I N G and leaves little to no room for creativity. i can imagine a number of creatives in that field, bound to very restrictive formats just because our media – not unlike hollywood – is a fan of beating the proverbial dead horse. 

and those that do try to be different? movies that are lucky enough to be featured in the indie circuit? they never make their rounds, nor do they make enough money or gain enough traction. and of these few indie movies that i’ve managed to see, all of them kind of leave a little bit more to be desired. but because these movies are made and produced so few and far between, you can’t help but lower your standards and just be glad that they’re being made in the first place.

rounding it all back up to skam pinas (LOL, i can’t with this), it’s for this reason that i don’t think that it’ll work here. there’s just no market for it. i would certainly support it, given that it’s done to the caliber of it’s pedigree, ofc. but i won’t support it purely because it’s filipino-made. that said, we’ll probably never get there. by the time the last skam remake airs, i’m pretty sure we’ll still be a traditional country that won’t be able to view the themes that skam deals with without a little bit of prejudice. take for instance, that one teleserye, “my husband’s lover”??? was that what it was called? that was the first ever gay themed teleserye to air, but they portrayed the gay relationship as secondary and associated it with adultery. and just, yeah. no. 

i hope this wasn’t too rambly and made some sort of sense. and i’d like to end this by saying that i’m always open to being wrong. if the right team here in the philippines manages to get a hold of skam, and skam were to expand outside of europe – which tbh, chances of both of these are slim to none – then that’d be worth a watch. until then…

tags: that would have been true galaxy brain level stuff
summary: Too bad Skam will end before Easter, or it would have been the perfect parallel. Lucas could have been at an Easter service...
body: Too bad Skam will end before Easter, or it would have been the perfect parallel. Lucas could have been at an Easter service instead of a Christmas concert, and whereas Christmas is the birth of Jesus, Easter is his resurrection, just like Skam France is the resurrection of the OG and of Evak. Also it would fit perfectly with the parallel universes theory.

Also it would fit perfectly with the parallel universes theory.

summary: Ateeee (can I call you Ate?) same Jollibee ask 😂😂😂 Since you mentioned Jollibee's tuna pie, what's your opinion on the...
question: Ateeee (can I call you Ate?) same Jollibee ask 😂😂😂 Since you mentioned Jollibee's tuna pie, what's your opinion on the chocomallow pie? Or the other flavors of Jollibee's pies?
answer:
guys, keep the jollibee questions coming. walang titigil hangga’t wala akong sponsorship, okay? LULZ

  • okay, so here is my honest review:

chocomallow pie: no/10
peach mango pie: 100/10
tuna pie: 99/10


my suggestions for future pies:

shawarma pie: if angel’s is doing it, ikaw pa kaya, jabee???
vanilla ice cream: bru, classic, but 10/10. kind of like fried ice cream, pero with the jabee pie crust, AKA heaven in a pie.
cutie pie: your already available pies, but hotties deliver it to customers. see axel or maxence for reference. just saying, jabee. something to consider.

you’re also allowed to call me ate mec.

love,
ate mec

vanilla ice cream: bru, classic, but 10/10. kind of like fried ice cream, pero with the jabee pie crust, AKA heaven in a pie.
cutie pie: your already available pies, but hotties deliver it to customers. see axel or maxence for reference. just saying, jabee. something to consider.

you’re also allowed to call me ate mec.

love,
ate mec
trail.content:
guys, keep the jollibee questions coming. walang titigil hangga’t wala akong sponsorship, okay? LULZ

  • okay, so here is my honest review:

chocomallow pie: no/10
peach mango pie: 100/10
tuna pie: 99/10


my suggestions for future pies:

shawarma pie: if angel’s is doing it, ikaw pa kaya, jabee???
vanilla ice cream: bru, classic, but 10/10. kind of like fried ice cream, pero with the jabee pie crust, AKA heaven in a pie.
cutie pie: your already available pies, but hotties deliver it to customers. see axel or maxence for reference. just saying, jabee. something to consider.

you’re also allowed to call me ate mec.

love,
ate mec
